src:
Klic na pomoč: ženska z otrokom in s psom se je izgubila v gozdu
Posredovali so reševalci GRS Ljubljana.
03 Nov 2019, 06:30 by A. L.
BIZOVIK – V soboto nekaj pred 18. uro je v okolici Bizovika v Ljubljani na gozdni poti proti Orlam s poti zašla občanka z majhnim otrokom in s psom. Poti nazaj ni našla.Na pomoč so jim priskočili reševalci GRS Ljubljana, ki so jih ob 18.45 uspešno našli in pospremili domov.
text:
Call for help: A woman with a baby and a dog lost in the woods
GRS Ljubljana rescuers intervened.
03 Nov 2019, 06:30 by A.L.
BIZOVIK - On Saturday, just before 6pm, a little girl and a dog walked out of the forest on the forest path towards Orlam near Bizovik in Ljubljana. She did not find her way back. GRS Ljubljana rescuers came to their aid, who were successfully found and escorted home at 6:45 pm.
